titleStmt.title: Some observations made upon the Bengala bean imported from the Indies shewing its admirable virtues in curing all sorts of hemorrages, and particularly spitting of blood / written by a doctor of physick in the countrey to one of his patients in London.
titleStmt.author: Peachi, John, fl. 1683.
Pechey, John, 1655-1716.

notesStmt.note: Attributed also to John Pechey--NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
